name: Trust (Pontus Jakobsson)
description:
Together you need to find the way out...

The boy has a candlestick, the girl a pickaxe. 

And what is it with the gnomes and their treasure?

Controlling the boy by moving WASD, the girl by moving arrow keys.

Made by By Pontus Jakobsson (Sound), Jari Hanski (Programming), & Amanda Backlund (Art) during an experimental game design course.
